        Categories: DEATH, VAMPIRE, MALIGNANT, HERO, WIZARD, BLOODSEEKER PALANQUIN, SOULBLIGHT, Leader, Behemoth

        Bloodseeker Palanquin 1/1The Sanguinarch on a Bloodseeker Palanquin is a WIZARD. She can attempt to cast one spell in your hero phase, and attempt to unbind one spell in the enemy hero phase. She knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Blood Siphon spells.
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Blood Siphon 6If successfully cast, pick an enemy HEROwithin 12" of the caster that is visible to them and roll a dice. On a 1-3 the hero suffers a mortal wound. On a 4-5 the hero suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 6 the hero suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Bloodseeker Palanquin *12104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        A Fine Vintage If an enemy HERO is slain within 9" of this model, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of any melee weapons used by friendly SOULBLIGHT units within 12" of this model until your next hero phase.
        Deathly Invocation At the start of your hero phase, pick up to 2 different friendly SUMMONABLE units within 6" of this model. You can heal D3 wounds that have been allocated to each unit you picked (roll separately for each unit). If no wounds are currently allocated to a unit you have picked, you may instead return a number of slain models to it that have a combined Wounds characteristic equal to or less than the roll of a D3.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Frightful Touch If the unmodified roll for an attack made with the <Banshee Mandmaidens' Spectral Claws>, <Wraith Herald's Spectral Claws>, <Fellreaper>, <Reaper Scythe> <Chill Dagger> <Spectral Scythe> <Cairn Wraith's Reaper Scythe> <Spectral Claws and Daggers> <Spectral Host's Ethereal Weapons>, <Mourngul's Nightmarish Claws and Fangs> is 6, that attack inflicts <the weapon damage as a> mortal wound and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Wail of the Damned When making a Wail of the Damned attack, roll two dice for each enemy unit within the range shown on the damage table. If the total is higher than that unit’s Bravery, it suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Wail of the Damned - ROLL 2D6 When making a Wail of the Damned attack, roll two dice for each enemy unit within the range shown on the damage table. If the total is higher than that unit’s Bravery, it suffers D3 mortal wounds.

      • Prince Vhordrai [480pts]

        Categories: DEATH, VAMPIRE, ZOMBIE DRAGON, MONSTER, HERO, WIZARD, PRINCE VHORDRAI, SOULBLIGHT, Leader, Behemoth

        Command Abilities: Fist of Nagash, Magic: Prince Vhordrai, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Quickblood, Unit: Prince Vhordrai, Unit Abilities: Bloodlance Charge, Breath of Shyish, Chalice of Blood, Deathly Invocation, Fly, The Hunger, Vhordrai's Wounds Suffered: 00-03, 04-06, 07-09, 10-12, 13+, Weapon: Bloodlance, Shordemaire's Maw, Shordemaire's Sword-like Claws


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Fist of Nagash If Prince Vhordrai uses this ability, pick a friendly DEATH HEROwithin 14" of him (you cannot choose Prince Vhordrai). That hero can immediately either be chosen to pile in and attack as if it were the combat phase, or if it is a WIZARD, attempt to cast a spell in addition to any others they can attempt to cast this phase. The same unit cannot be picked to benefit from this command ability more than once per hero phase. *ERRATA Jun'18*

        Prince Vhordrai 1/1Prince Vhordrai is a WIZARD. He can attempt to cast one spell in your hero phase, and attempt to unbind one spell in the enemy hero phase. He knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Quickblood spells.

On a 3+ that unit suffers a number of mortal wounds as shown on the damage table above.

    • Battalion [150pts]

      • Battalion: *COURT OF NULAHMIA [150pts]

        Categories: LEGION OF BLOOD, Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: The Adevore, The Scent of Blood


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        The Adevore Whilst she is within 9" of this battalion’s Bloodseeker Palanquin, you may re-roll failed hit rolls for Neferata if the target is an enemy HERO
        The Scent of Blood At the start of your movement phase, units from the Court of Nulahmia that are within 9" of the battalion’s Bloodseeker Palanquin may add 4" to their Move characteristic until the end of the phase.

    • Allegiance

      • Alliegiance

        Selections: Allegiance: Soulblight

        Categories: Allegiance

        Battle Trait: Deathless Thralls, Magic


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Deathless Thralls Roll a dice each time you allocate a wound or mortal wound to a friendly SOULBLIGHT unit within 6" of your general or another SOULBLIGHT HEROfrom your army. On a 6+ the wound is negated.
        Magic All WIZARDS in a SOULBLIGHT army know an additional spell from the Lore of the Vampire.

    • Malign Sorcery [70pts]

      • Endless Spell: Aethervoid Pendulum [50pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, AETHERVOID PENDULUM, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Aethervoid Pendulum, Unit Abilities: Fly, Predatory, Scything Blade, Slicing Into Reality, Unstoppable Mechanism


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Aethervoid Pendulum 6If successfully cast, set up an Aethervoid Pendulum model wholly within 6" of the caster so that it points lengthways in the direction you wish it to move.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Predatory An Aethervoid Pendulum is a predatory endless spell. It can move up to 8" and can fly.
        Scything Blade After this model has moved, each unit that has any models it passed across, and each other unit that is within 1" of it at the end of its move, suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Slicing Into Reality When this model is set up, the player who set it up can immediately make a move with it.
        Unstoppable Mechanism Whenever you set up an Aethervoid Pendulum, you must place it lengthways in the direction you wish it to move. Whenever it moves, move it in a straight line in that direction.

      • Endless Spell: Malevolent Maelstrom [10pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, MALEVOLENT MAELSTROM, SHYISH, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Malevolent Maelstrom, Unit Abilities: Devourerer of Sorcery and Souls, Empowered by Shyish, Fly, Morbid Detonation, Predatory


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Malevolent Maelstrom 7If successfully cast, set up a Malevolent Maelstrom model wholly within 18" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Devourerer of Sorcery and Souls If a WIZARD successfully casts a spell within 12" of a Malevolent Maelstrom, and that spell is not unbound, the Malevolent Maelstrom will attempt to steal the energies of the spell. Make an additional unbinding roll for that spell. If this unbinding roll is successful, the spell is unbound and 1 energy point is allocated to this model. In addition, 1 energy point is allocated to this model for each unit destroyed within 6" of this model.
        Empowered by Shyish If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Death, allocate 1 additional energy point to this model at the start of each battle round.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Morbid Detonation At the end of each battle round, roll a dice for each Malevolent Maelstrom and add the number of energy points allocated to that model to the roll. On a 7+ that Malevolent Maelstrom explodes. Each unit within 3D6" of the model that exploded suffers D3 mortal wounds. The model that exploded is then dispelled.
        Predatory A Malevolent Maelstrom is a predatory endless spell. It can move up to 8" and can fly.

Force Rules

Returning Slain Models - Nighthaunt: Several Nighthaunt abilities allow you to return slain models to a unit. When you do so, set up the models one at a time within 1" of a model from the unit they are returning to (this can be a model you returned to the unit earlier in the same phase).

The slain models you return to a unit can only be set up withi 3" of an enemy unit if one or more models from the unit they are returning to are already within 3" of an enemy unit. (Battletome: Nighthaunt)
